alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 02 at 2:29PM MDT until October 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, mainly above 8,500 feet. Snow accumulation will vary greatly with elevation. Generally 3 to 6 inches between 8,500 feet and 9,500 feet. Higher amounts over 10 inches possible above 10,000 feet. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. The heaviest period of snow will be tonight through Tuesday morning, decreasing Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel in the mountains could be difficult. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be prepared for cold and wet conditions if spending time in the backcountry. &&
